In summary, based on our novel synthesized blend of variant apatite and covellite, we observe near-room-temperature superconductivity coexisting with another low-temperature superconducting phase. Following our concept of synthesis, we believe the properties of superconductivities can be largely improved in the near future and promising applications can be soon established
